titles.title: Condemning the recent violence against members of the media in the Philippines.
Condemning the recent violence against members of the media in the Philippines.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Condemns the recent violence against members of the media in the Philippines.
Expresses condolences to the families of Joselito Agustin, Desiderio Camangyan, and other victims of such violence.
Calls on the government of the Philippines to fully investigate the murders of Joselito Agustin and Desiderio Camangyan.
